View Your Services
------------------

View services at your address with this map.
  
  
[View Your Services](https://georgetowntx.maps.arcgis.com/apps/InformationLookup/index.html?appid=ee536b40088e44c6afdd18b2fb8112ec)

* [Home](https://georgetowntexas.gov/)
* [Government](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/index.php)
* City Council


Meet the City Council
=====================

Enter your address into the map below and you will view your:

* Georgetown City Council District
* Other city services

  
  
Vision of the Council  
Georgetown: A welcoming and safe community honoring our past and planning for a vibrant future.  
  
Current City Council Members

* [District 1: Amanda Parr](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_1.php)
* [District 2: Shawn Hood](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_2.php)
* [District 3: Ben Butler](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_3.php)
* [District 4: Ron Garland](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_4.php)
* [District 5: Kevin Pitts](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_5.php)
* [District 6: Jake French](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_6.php)
* [District 7: Ben Stewart](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/district_7.php)

City Council Meetings  
The City Council meets every second and fourth Tuesday at the Council and Court Building, 510 West Ninth St., unless otherwise noted on the agenda. Meetings are recorded and re-broadcast on Suddenlink cable channel 10 at 6 p.m. on the Wednesday, Friday, and Sunday following each meeting.  

* [Watch live and recorded council meetings](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/meeting_agendas/gtv.php)
* [Find meeting minutes and procedures](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/meeting_agendas/index.php)
* [View current and past council agendas](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/meeting_agendas/agendas.php)
* [Speak at a council meeting](https://georgetowntexas.gov/government/city_council/meeting_agendas/speak.php)

Governance Policy & Strategic Direction  
The City Council adopted a governance policy outlining the responsibilities City Council members have to each other, to staff, and to the public. [Read the Governance Policy](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Documents/Government/City%20Council/City_Council_Governance_Policy_FINAL-1.pdf?t=202407081109050).  
  
Each year, the Georgetown City Council meets to review and define their Council Governance Policy, Council Rules of Engagement, Governance Initiatives, and Vision and Mission. Council met in December 2024 to define their goals for 2025.  The Summary and List of Goals are attached.  
[Council Strategic Planning Summary 2024](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Documents/Government/City%20Council/Council%20Strategic%20Planning%20Summary%202024.pdf?t=202501141709470)  and [Council Goals List 2025](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Documents/Government/City%20Council/Council%20Goals%20List%202025.pdf?t=202506181320560)





![Doc app](https://georgetowntexas.gov/revize/plugins/document_center/_images_/app.png)
